item.title: About
item.description: Hi ദ്ദി(˵ •̀ ᴗ - ˵ ) ✧ I’m Chloe, a student currently studying in Singapore studying under the A-level (GCSE) syllabus taking subjects: H2 Math, Further Math, H2 Econs, and H2 Physics. This is my platform where I share notes/resources that you may find helpful! In my free time I like to play badminton, play the piano, crochet and eat good food. Feel free to browse around ⊹ ࣪ ˖
